ModMetaData.name: The Liberators
ModMetaData.author: Slomow
ModMetaData.description:
The time has come, a formidable force conquering the rim is approaching, and you are their next target, they will kill everything in their path to achieve their goal: stripping your planet of resources and use it as yet another base.
They also use armored vehicles and even their fleet of starships for war.
